vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection
vulnerabilities.description: User input concatenated directly into SQL query without sanitization

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-Site Scripting
vulnerabilities.description: User input rendered in HTML without escaping

vulnerabilities.title: Weak SSH Configuration
vulnerabilities.description: SSH server allows password authentication with weak ciphers

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Headers
vulnerabilities.description: Nginx missing critical security headers (HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options)

vulnerabilities.title: Database Network Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: PostgreSQL accessible from external networks without firewall rules

vulnerabilities.title: Weak Authentication
vulnerabilities.description: Using MD5 for password hashing instead of bcrypt or Argon2

vulnerabilities.title: Configuration Error
vulnerabilities.description: Debug mode enabled in production environment

vulnerabilities.title: Permission Issue
vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive files have overly permissive file permissions (777)
